title-group.article-title: Computing the Wedderburn Decomposition of Group Algebras by the Brauer-Witt Theorem

abstract.p: We present an alternative constructive proof of the Brauer-Witt theorem using the so-called strongly monomial characters that gives rise to an algorithm for computing the Wedderburn decomposition of semisimple group algebras of finite groups.
